name: Cohannon Inn and Autolodge

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were a bit reticent about this place as it is part of a petrol station on the outskirts of Dungannon. When you are in the corridor heading for your room, there is a smell of smoke, and the hall ways have the feel of a barracks about them. However the rooms are more than adequate. Clean rooms with working telly, showers and basic but clean duvets. The bathroom was excellent. The shower and toilet spotless. We had the breakfast on the following morning and both thought it excellent. I had a bacon and sausage buttie and she had poached egg. It was a fiver each and great value. Highly recommended. We would stay here again. It was two star but was very good. It is half the price of other hotels in the area so definitely work investigating. One of the biggest pluses is the ample parking and the fact that you are beside a filling station for all your amenities. The only downside was that we were woken to screaming and roaring at 2am, but it didn't last long. Not the hotel's fault if some people are inconsiderate
reviews.title: Not the Ritz but does the job

reviews.text: Myself and a colleague stayed for 2 nights on a business trip. The room was very clean with comfortable beds and a very clean spacious ensuite with lots of hot water and shower gel and hand wash provided. Towels were changed every day and the room cleaned. There were tea and coffee facilities and a hair dryer. There was a small TV with good number of channels. A bedside reading light would have been useful. There was a smell of smoking at the bottom of the stairs at the telephone area but our room was fresh and clean.
reviews.title: Good value for money

reviews.text: We got breakfast and dinner on site and the food was hot of good quality and good portions. The staff at reception were friendly and helpful and the staff in the restaurant were likewise.
reviews.title: Hit and miss.

reviews.text: There is a very good shop on site and an ATM machine as well as lots of free parking. So all in all good value for money stay.
reviews.title: Cheap and cheerful

reviews.text: Passing through and eaten here a few times.
reviews.title: 101% satisfied. Definitely will visit again

reviews.text: Stayed at autolodge 3 weeks staff were brill many thanks for all they did for us .Clean rooms evertday .special Thanks to Courtney, Lee,Acquinos, Martina,and lovely Margeret. Maria has a lovely loyal mix of staff that will made your stay that extra special. Thanks again Patt,Brien,Peter Matthew Rolex and HINGE & BRACKET.
reviews.title: What a great time.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great hotel just off the motorway outside Dungannon - stayed here for a party in Cookstown and could not fault the place or the staff in any way. The receptionist is very friendly and helped me when my card would not work - she was very helpful and so kind. The rooms are basic but have exactly what you need for a nights stay and anything you forgot you can buy from the petrol station on site. WIll definately be back soon.
reviews.title: brilliant place to stay just an hour from enniskillen

reviews.text: Stayed here two nights for an occasion nearby. Comfortable, clean and friendly.
reviews.title: good for a no-frills stay

reviews.text: Quite a few amenities available either in the hotel or right next-door (reasonable basic restaurant, well-stocked Spar shop, fish+chips, hairdressers, fuel pumps...). Room was quite spacious.
reviews.title: Lovely Restaurant

reviews.text: Overall very good as a basic stop-over for a night or a couple of nights.
reviews.title: Clean and comfortable.

reviews.text: Well,where do I start?..I stayed at the cohannon auto lodge for nearly 3 months with my works colleagues. Out of all the hotels I've stayed at whilst working throughout the UK this hotel has been by far the best.the rooms where cleaned everyday even weekends and were very comfortable.the staff were outstanding especially the bar staff who put up with us every night.the food is very good I think I tried everything on the menu during my stay and enjoyed everything...when we left it got quite emotional... That's how much we enjoyed our stay..I would recommend the cohannon inn to any visitor, business or pleasure. Will be returning hopefully early in the new year.
reviews.title: steve

reviews.text: Stayed here a while, clean accommodation, tidy rooms, all you need for a comfortable stay. Close to connections and some handy amenities on site. All the staff very friendly and welcoming! Found the atmosphere in the bar enjoyable
reviews.title: Couldn't fault the stay!

reviews.text: Stayed here last week during a business trip and this is the best cooked breakfast I have had in a long time. Everything was freshly prepared and they were happy to give me a different combination to what was on the menu.
reviews.title: Made to order breakfast-lovely

reviews.text: The room was clean and comfortable and the staff were friendly. All in all a very comfortable stay.
reviews.title: Not a very nice place

reviews.text: Stayed on a buisness trip, not a very nice place, no athmosphere in the bar and restruant, dinner was ok but breakfast was terrible.
reviews.title: delicious food and brilliant customer service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our second visit to the Cohannon. Accomodation is basic but we had everything we needed. The room was clean and comfortable. Food was good and reasonably priced and we found the service good.
reviews.title: A welcoming place to stay

reviews.text: The staff were friendly and very obliging.
reviews.title: Really, really good

reviews.text: We will certainly be returning for another visit
reviews.title: Home from home

reviews.text: We enjoyed our stay here. The room was pretty basic but had everything we needed. The food was excellent and good value for money, the staff were all friendly and the service was excellent. We could have done without trucks arriving and being unloaded outside the window from 5:30am but otherwise this was a great place to stay.
reviews.title: Will definitely be back....

reviews.text: My wife and I stayed at this hotel for a short get away last weekend. We were generally pleased with the room and service at the restaurant was great. Would definately be back. Food was suburb and value for money, would highly recommend this place to friends and family.
reviews.title: Rude business lunch (not a room review)

aka: Cohannon Inn And Autolodge Dungannon, Northern Ireland
